title: Bug 3970 - UI needed to define the default line delimiters for new files
description: The Windows work stations are used as X terminals and to run Eclipse (since PC are cheaper than Unix boxes).
OB: Currently, when a new file is created on Windows, it has Windows line delimiters.
EB: Even if the new file is created on Windows, it should have Unix line delimiters since the end product is a Unix product. There should be a UI (Preference) to define the line delimiter for new files. Possible values are: Dos/Windows, Mac, Unix, and default platform line delimiter. The UI should be provided by the Workbench since all plugins should use the same line delimiter for new files.
SR: To reproduce the issue, consider the following scenario: Use both a Unix and Windows workstation to develop a Unix product / program.
